General.Name: Three A Resources Bhd
General.Description: Three-A Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells food and beverage ingredients in Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. Its products portfolio includes liquid caramels and caramel colors; fermented, distilled, and rice vinegar products; glucose, golden, and maltose syrups; soya protein sauces; hydrolyzed vegetable protein, caramel, and soya sauce powders; and maltodextrin. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
